text: betfairlightweight presents the streaming data to you identically as if you had called listMarketBook (with the addition of the marketDefinition). If you have streaming enabled on your account, it's hard to imagine any scenario where making listMarketBook calls would be preferred

elements.text: betfairlightweight presents the streaming data to you identically as if you had called listMarketBook (with the addition of the marketDefinition). If you have streaming enabled on your account, it's hard to imagine any scenario where making listMarketBook calls would be preferred

text: awesome cheers Mo, in regards to the more_available and from_record,   would I put them into the get_account_statement ?

elements.text: awesome cheers Mo, in regards to the more_available and from_record,   would I put them into the get_account_statement ?

text:
Roughly you want something like:

```
more_available = True
from_record = 0
account_statement = []
while more_available:
    account_statement_result = trading.account.get_account_statement(item_date_range=acct_statement_date_filter, from_record=from_record)
    more_available = account_statement_result.more_available
    from_record += len(account_statement_result.account_statement)
    account_statement.extend(account_statement_result.account_statement)
```

    account_statement.extend(account_statement_result.account_statement)

text: `account_statement_result` gets overwritten on each iteration of the while loop

elements.text: account_statement_result
gets overwritten on each iteration of the while loop

text: That's why I have the separate `account_statement` list that gets extended on each iteration

account_statement

text: If the data frame construction requires the underlying data then I would do something like:

elements.text: If the data frame construction requires the underlying data then I would do something like:

text:
```
days_ago = (datetime.datetime.utcnow() - datetime.timedelta(days=14)).strftime("%Y-%m-%dT%TZ")
acct_statement_date_filter = betfairlightweight.filters.time_range(from_=days_ago)

more_available = True
from_record = 0
data = []
while more_available:
    account_statement_result = trading.account.get_account_statement(item_date_range=acct_statement_date_filter, from_record=from_record)
    more_available = account_statement_result.more_available
    from_record += len(account_statement_result.account_statement)
    data.extend(account_statement_result._data['accountStatement'])

recent_transactions = pd.DataFrame(data)
recent_transactions
```

elements.text:
days_ago = (datetime.datetime.utcnow() - datetime.timedelta(days=14)).strftime("%Y-%m-%dT%TZ")
acct_statement_date_filter = betfairlightweight.filters.time_range(from_=days_ago)

more_available = True
from_record = 0
data = []
while more_available:
    account_statement_result = trading.account.get_account_statement(item_date_range=acct_statement_date_filter, from_record=from_record)
    more_available = account_statement_result.more_available
    from_record += len(account_statement_result.account_statement)
    data.extend(account_statement_result._data['accountStatement'])

recent_transactions = pd.DataFrame(data)
recent_transactions
